Your shopping cart is waiting for you

Hey {{billing_address.first_name}},

we noticed there were some items left in your shopping cart. If you're ready to complete your order, your cart is waiting for your return.

Complete your purchase

Items in your cart

Item

Description

Cost

{{p.first}}:{{p.last}}{% endunless %}{% endfor %}{% endcapture %}

{{line.title}} x {{line.quantity}}

{{product_attributes}}

{{line.line_price | money}}

{% endfor %}

Your discount coupon

As a way of saying thanks for shopping with us, here is a discount code for 10% off your next purchase within the next two weeks.

SHOP NOW!

Please do not hesitate to get in contact if you have any questions.

Many thanks,
Team Retainful
